name: Druid: Three paths to Blue Crystal
name_original: Druid: Three paths to Blue Crystal
description: My game is about a young mage novice who's been left alone in the Tower by his teachers that left for finding new ways to learn magic. They demanded him to stay and also left clones of themselves across the Tower's garden to stop the novice from finding them. Your task is to find your teachers or what they are looking for through different obstacles which will test you.
